CONTRACT_ID: Just a unique identifier based on the Tender ID
short_summary: The Defence Department requires supplying 10 packs and harnesses.
description: The procured packs and harnesses are to be used at a specific depot and the contract will be privatized.

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the item detailed below. The delivery is requested at the depot(s) indentified below. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

- Item 1, GSIN: 1670, NSN: 1670-20-002-6114, PACK AND HARNESS ASSEMBLY (ASSEMBLAGE PACK ET HARNAIS) - Part No.: ID-52-323, NCAGE: 09511 - Quantity: 10 - Unit of Issue: Each - to be delivered to 15 Westwin Ave, FCA Free Carrier.

Note: Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
